name: Second Thoughts (itch)
description:
Play as, not one, but TWO wizards at a time. Each with different spells and strengths, its up to YOU to decide when and where to use each one. Explore different parts of the dungeon at the same time? Switch INSTANTLY to each character with the touch of a button? Fight EPIC monsters and slay EPIC bosses. From powerups to spells, this game is full on action.

Single Player Co-Op Game in A Dangerous Dungeon. Made For Weekly Game Jam 136!
